name: Dino Golf Bounce Edition
description:
Dive into a new and unexpected take on golf games! In DINO GOLF you do not control the golfer, instead you are the golf ball and your objective is to reach the end without falling.

This game was developed by the Reindeer game jam team for the AIE Winter 2022 Game Jam

Controls

  • W/A - Decide direction
  • SPACE - Power
  • Mouse - Camera Movement
  • ESC - pause / un-pause 

CREDITS
